oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from H.L. Turney to P.J. Sullivan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hopkins Lacy Turney was originally from Dixon Springs in Smith County who settled in Jasper, TN. Born October 3, 1797, he served in the Seminole War and then began practicing law in Jasper and Winchester. He served in both the Tennessee House of Representatives, the U.S. House of Representatives, and represented Tennessee in the U.S Senate. This letter is clearly to a friend as he reminisces about former sums of pleasure and amusement.
